title: ManaJonah
author: ManaJonah
content: I was very curious about how Bitcoin works and what it is all about, so I asked a few of my friends who I knew had knowledge about Bitcoin and learned the basics. In my quest to learn more, I began an online search, where I came across this forum. I noticed that everything on the forum is about Bitcoin, so I decided to create an account here. I would be extremely grateful if I would get additional information and guidance about the forum.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Go through this thread; Newbies; Read before posting. It contains all the information a new member would need about the forum. Your emphasis now should be on learning about the forum rules, so as not to violate anyone and getting aquatinted with using the forum resources like the Search option.The Help section would help you in discovering how to navigate the forum.

comments.body: Welcome to this Forum though bitcointalk is mainly about bitcoin but it has other off topics relating to cryptocurrency, politics, Economics and others.This forum is not really for making money but to learn and contribute to it. You need merit to rank up which are mainly gotten through your Contributions in the forum.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk forum. Well, this board that you posted have pinned topics or threads you can check or view and then learn the content. There are also other forum members who created a thread about how to create constructive post if you plan to stay active on this forum. You are wrong about where Bitcointalk forum is about Bitcoin because this forum is the place where people discuss or share information either a warning, tips or guides and more so, you can say that this forum is about cryptocurrency in general. At first, the goal is for Bitcoin only until people discuss other than Bitcoin.

comments.body: Welcome to the forum, you came to the right place to learn. I hope you'll take part in discussions and get to like the forum. I recommend this man. There's a lot of threads in here that will answer all your crypto-related questions.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: OP got all the links he needs to learn about the forums guideline and rules. Keep in mind that if anyone comes to your inbox and send you any links don't click them because scammers will take the chance to scam you. In this forum you can also learn about other things, the forum is not limited to bitcoin only. There are different boards for different purposes. By the way, welcome to the forum.

comments.author: bounceback
comments.body: Deciding to join this forum is one of the right decisions because in this forum you will definitely get a lot of knowledge about cryptocurrency information, moreover in this forum there are many senior members who have extensive experience about bitcoin both the technology that runs behind bitcoin and other experiences that related to cryptocurrencies, so we will always get answers that are interesting and easy for us to understand from the seniors in this forum when discussing.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Welcome and explore the forum more. You will realize that the forum is not just about Bitcoin. Not "everything on the forum is about Bitcoin." This is an interesting forum; you could actually discuss anything you have in mind. Although this is Bitcointalk, you can actually discuss about altcoins and shitcoins here, as well as gambling, economics, even about politics and society, and all kinds of topics. Just don't forget about certain rules.

comments.author: reagansimms
comments.body: It's easier to learn all that directly from your friends than asking here. You can also dig up more detailed information through online searches to increase your knowledge about bitcoin and then learn slowly. When you encounter problems, you can ask directly to friends who are around you. In the forum, content is available that discusses Bitcoin in detail, you can find information via threads that have been pinned on several boards.
